Detailed Description

Typedef Documentation

typedef struct I2C_SlaveMCB_t I2C_SlaveMCB

I2C Driver Slave Control Block.

The structure is used to hold all the pertinent information with respect to the I2C Slave Driver.

Function Documentation

void I2CSlaveEnable ( I2CRegs *  i2cRegs)

Enables the I2C module in slave mode. This will bring the I2C module out of reset.

Parameters
[in]i2cRegsMemory address of the I2C instance used.
Return values
Notapplicable
